item.title: HLA Hart's The Concept of Law: What Everyone Gets Wrong! [Part 1]
item.description: This Thursday we’re taking a look at HLA Hart’s seminal work: The Concept of Law. It was Hart’s most complete formulation of his legal postivism (in part because he updated it over the course of his career). We’ll take a look at the intro to the newest edition, written by legal philosopher Leslie Green, who brilliantly explains the various parts of Hart’s theory that have been misunderstood.
